name: Midnight Oud
description: A deep and smoky scent with notes of oud, amber, and sandalwood.

name: Rose Bouquet
description: A fresh, floral fragrance with notes of rose and jasmine.

name: Citrus Breeze
description: A light and refreshing fragrance with hints of lemon, orange, and bergamot.

name: Vanilla Dream
description: A sweet and creamy scent with notes of vanilla, caramel, and a touch of musk.

name: RoboAds Mist
description: An earthy fragrance with rich notes of cedarwood, patchouli, and moss.
